Entry.JapaneseText: サレ……いつ見てもムカつくっ！
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh... He gets on my nerves every time I see him!

Entry.JapaneseText: よせ、<Mao>。そうやって怒る事こそ サレの思うツボだぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Knock it off, <Mao>. Getting angry like that is exactly what Saleh wants.

Entry.JapaneseText: あいつは人の心を踏みにじり、 怒りや苦しみを見て喜びを感じるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: He tramples on people's hearts and takes pleasure in watching them be consumed by anger and agony.

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく…… とんでもないヒネクレ者だネ！
それも、あいつにとっては 誉め言葉かもしれんがな……
Entry.EnglishText: I think he would probably take that as a compliment...
